title: Loyalty Event Details
description: Loyalty-related event data such as discounts, coupon/points/redemption, referrals, and points gained.

xdm:loyalty.description: Captures loyalty-related attributes observed on an experience event.

xdm:discounts.title: Discounts
xdm:discounts.description: List of discounts applied as part of this event.

xdm:value.title: Discount Value
xdm:value.description: Monetary value of the discount applied.

xdm:source.title: Discount Source
xdm:source.description: Origin of the discount (e.g., coupon, referral, pointsRedemption).

xdm:triggeredForItem.title: Triggered For Item
xdm:triggeredForItem.description: SKU or identifier of the item this discount is for, if applicable.

xdm:scope.title: Scope
xdm:scope.description: Scope of the discount (e.g., additionalCost, item, total).

xdm:promotionId.title: Promotion ID
xdm:promotionId.description: Identifier of the promotion that triggered this discount.

xdm:series.title: Coupon Series
xdm:series.description: Series or campaign the coupon belongs to.

xdm:seriesName.title: Coupon Series Name
xdm:seriesName.description: Human-readable name of the coupon series.

xdm:promotionId.title: Promotion ID
xdm:promotionId.description: Identifier of the promotion this coupon is from.

xdm:pointsRedemption.title: Points Redemption
xdm:pointsRedemption.description: Points redeemed as part of this event.

xdm:promotionId.title: Promotion ID
xdm:promotionId.description: Identifier of the promotion governing this points redemption.

xdm:loyaltyProgramId.title: Loyalty Program ID
xdm:loyaltyProgramId.description: Identifier of the loyalty program managing these points.

xdm:transactionId.title: Transaction ID
xdm:transactionId.description: Identifier of the points redemption transaction, if applicable.

xdm:referralRedemption.title: Referral Redemptions
xdm:referralRedemption.description: Referral codes redeemed during this event.

xdm:promotionId.title: Promotion ID
xdm:promotionId.description: Identifier of the promotion the referral is from.

xdm:pointsGained.title: Points Gained
xdm:pointsGained.description: Points gained as part of this event.

xdm:promotionId.title: Promotion ID
xdm:promotionId.description: Identifier of the promotion governing this points acquisition.

xdm:loyaltyProgramId.title: Loyalty Program ID
xdm:loyaltyProgramId.description: Identifier of the loyalty program managing these points.

xdm:transactionId.title: Transaction ID
xdm:transactionId.description: Identifier of the points acquisition transaction, if applicable.
